text: Þis synd þara twentiges hida landgemæra to burhtune ærest of widig forda andlang weges to pippenespenne.
Of pippenespenne, andlang slades on turcandene.
Up andlang dene to þære swelstowe syððan andlang foss to þan ealdan sice wið slohterword.
Andlang sices on wenris, andlang streames eft on wiðig ford.
Þonne is þis þara VII hida landgemæra æt mæþelgares byrig þe hyrd into burghtune.
Ærest of mæþelgeres byrig on deopancumb of deopancumbe on cwenena broce of cwenena broce up be þam geride.
To þam beorgan, of þam beorgan on fiscwille.
Of fiscwille on mæswille, of mæswille on sealter wille.
Of sealter pille &lang broces to þam greatan þorne.
Of þam þorne on þorn beorh, of þorn beorge on foss eft &lang foss.
Þæt in on da ea on wænric.
Up on stream oð ðone garan suðweardne.
Of þam garan on horwyt of horpytte eft on foss.
Wid suðan þone garan, andlang foss eft on mæþelgares byrig.
Þon is þis þara VII hida landgemæra æt dægeles forda þe hirð into burgtune.
Ærest of blædene on mules hlæw<../images/tbar.gif>forð up to heortdune.
To hwettan stanes wylle of hwættan staneswille on heort broc of þam broce on þa stige.
Andlang stige dic &lang dic on þa stræt to þære oðere stræt.
Oþ þære stræt on beagan wille anlang broces eft on blædene.
Oscetel circwærd.
